quotes.quote: Find beauty in the world around you, even in the ordinary.
Thankfulness opens doors for blessings to enter your life.
We can choose to be grateful no matter what.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: You begin to elevate when you are thankful.
Blessings are a seed. Nourish and nurture them.
There is something to enjoy in each moment. Sometimes it may be harder to find, but it's always there.
It's the most thankful farmers who reap the most abundant harvests.
Gratitude is a light bulb that brightens your day and illuminates the way forward.
Perspective is everything. If you can't see reasons to be thankful, it's time to start viewing your world through a new lens.
If we fill our hours with regrets over the failures of yesterday, we have no today in which to be thankful.
Gratitude is the appreciation of things that are not deserved, earned or demanded â€“ those wonderful things that we take for granted.
The highest fruit on the tree is also the sweetest. The more you fight for your blessings, the prouder you'll be.
Be so busy giving thanks that your mind has no time left for worrying.
That thankful heart of yours is a magnet for blessings and joy.
Gratitude is the surest path to abundance.
Stop. Take a deep breath. Enjoy this moment.
When you appreciate what you have, it multiplies.
Being grateful allows your life to blossom.
It's never too early or too late to pause and look back on your life with a grateful heart.
Never take anything for granted, be grateful for everything that comes your way.
The more gratitude you express, the more inner peace you'll experience.
Thankfulness isn't just gratitude for your blessings, it's your generosity with them, too.
Every day has the potential to be wonderful once you find reasons to be thankful.
When you cultivate a grateful heart, you can be sure the Universe will listen to what you have to say.
Be grateful for who you are. The Universe never made someone quite like you.
Let joy and thankfulness flow from your heart and watch abundance and happiness flow into it.
There is a wonderful feeling in seeing your life through the lens of thankfulness.
Start each morning by counting your blessings and carry your gratitude with you all day.
The trick is to be grateful when your mood is high and graceful when it is low.
quotes.author: Richard Carlson

quotes.quote: One moment of gratitude can change your entire day.
